info.name: Dark Instagram by DM
info.description:
More Info: https://dark-by-dm9.webnode.it/
Thanks to jaaneh for the scrollbar included in this style.

Has support for mobile version in 4.0
Here's you can find the instructions: https://dark-by-dm9.webnode.it/tutorials/
info.additionalInfo:
-5.8 (15/05/2020)
  fixed some icons
  fixed borders in DMs
  fixed profile directories

-5.7 (27/04/2020)
  fixed some minor details in DMs tab

-5.6 (16/04/2020)
  fixed icons when sharing a post

-5.5 (28/03/2020)
  fixed activity tab

-5.4 (27/03/2020)
  fixed usernames in stories

-5.3 (16/03/2020)
  merged fixes made by iamrameffort on GitHub [patch:2]

-5.2 (15/03/2020)
  merged fixes made by iamrameffort on GitHub

-5.1 (10/03/2020)
  comment/picture section fixed by the community over Discord server
  fixed animations

-5.0 (09/03/2020)
  added support to direct messages
  fixed some minor imperfections

-4.6 (01/03/2020)
  fixed username colors

-4.5 (28/01/2020)
  fixed user-agent-version direct messages

-4.4 (21/01/2020)
  fix submitted by user

-4.3 (23/12/2019)
  fixed comment section

-4.2 (30/11/2019)
  fixed mention popup

-4.1 (1/09/2019)
  fixed some bugs

-4.0 (29/06/2019)
  added the ability to switch to mobile version
  if you are using a mobile version of Instagram you can now go to "manage styles" > Dark Instagram by DM and then remove " .deleteme " in front of the second url at the bottom of the code.
  (Here's a little tutorial on how to turn this feature on: https://dark-by-dm9.webnode.it/tutorials/)

  fixed some bugs

-3.16 (26/06/2019)
  fixed explore tab
  fixed hashtags in following tab
  fixed people following in following tab

-3.15 (01/06/2019)
  fixed comment section

-3.14 (07/03/2019)
  dark scrollbar is now back
  fixed some other fonts

-3.13 (07/02/2019)
  fixed footer text

-3.12 (02/02/2019)
  fixed some bugs
  ! Still working on the following tab !

-3.11 (21/01/2019)
  fixed the profilepictures of friends appearing next to the likes

-3.10 (08/1/2019)
  fixed navigation icons

-3.9 (11/12/2018)
  fixed animations when loading a profile
  fixed share menu

-3.8 (04/12/2018)
  fixed font in settings

-3.7 (06/11/2018)
  fixed some bugs

-3.6.1 (30/10/2018)
  slightly changed the scrollbar

-3.6 (30/10/2018)
  code 2 is now "deactivated" and is going to be deleted in the next updates
  some minor fixes

-3.5 (29/10/2018)
  fix by ZaiA
  other little fixes

-3.4.1 (19/10/2018)
  fixed like/comment buttons
  New scrollbar (Thanks to jaaneh)

-3.14 (18/10/2018)
  fixed the side menu on the left that got redesigned recently

-3.13 (01/10/2018)
  bug fixes

-3.12 (30/09/2018)
  fixed Instagram logo

-3.11 (25/09/2018)
  fixed some bugs/elements

-3.10 (23/09/2018)
  fixed "following" tab

-3.9 (18/09/2018)
  fixed embedded immages  [by jaaneh]

-3.8 (14/08/2018)
  fixed embedded immages code menu [feedback: jaaneh]
  fixed border in follow/unfollow button

-3.7 (07/08/2018)
  fixed some fonts

-3.6 (28/07/18)
  fixed follow/following text
  fixed hastag text

-3.5 (18/07/18)
  fixed some icons in profile
  fixed some fonts
  fixed profile immage background
  now you can see the version number in the code lines

-3.4 (12/07/18)
  fixed many bugs

-3.3 (21/06/18)
  fixed again background and some icons

-3.2 (07/06/18)
  fixed background

-3.1 (01/06/18)
  fixed like counter/name
  removed old code, the style should work for everyone with the new code. If not leave a comment.

-3.0.1 (01/06/18)
  added old code to the new one, now everyone can use the style


-3.0 (31/05/18)
  completely revrote the style to make it compatible with the new Instagram code
